entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Earlton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:36 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Earlton Airport 6:52 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: W 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
